pacman.entries.ghosts.fair

Class ExplorerRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.entries.ghosts.fair.ExplorerRunner

  • public class ExplorerRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    The HunterRunner uses a Game and an AntMaze to estimate the possible next moves of Ms. Pac-Man
    Author:
    Iris Hunkeler
